definitions.definition: an ice skate or roller skate.
a device, typically with wheels on the underside, used to move a heavy or unwieldy object.
move on ice skates or roller skates in a gliding fashion.
examples: the boys were skating on the ice
figure eights skated entirely on one foot

definitions.definition: pass over or refer only fleetingly to (a subject or problem).
examples: she seemed to skate over the next part of her story

definitions.definition: make quick and easy progress through.
examples: he admits he had expected to skate through the system

definitions.definition: a typically large marine fish of the ray family with a cartilaginous skeleton and a flattened diamond-shaped body.
the flesh of a skate or thornback used as food.
